## OpenSearchServiceStart.createClient property

Create application specific OpenSearch cluster API client with customized config. See [IClusterClient](./opensearch-dashboards.iclusterclient.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly createClient: (type: string, clientConfig?: Partial<OpenSearchClientConfig>) => ICustomClusterClient;
```

## Example


```js
const client = opensearch.createClient('my-app-name', config);
const data = await client.asInternalUser.search();
```
